name: The Cartoon Kitchen: Simple Chocolate Sauce
description: Editor's note: Larry Gonick, a brilliant San Francisco–based cartoonist, is an avid and very fine home cook. He did a series of recipe cartoons for newspapers that I've always loved. We'll be bringing you one of these Sunday funnies from...

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the cream in a heavy saucepan. Add marshmallows and chocolate chips, and beat continuously until completely melted.
Continue beating as it cools until your arm gets tired. Then it is done.
